Package amadeus.personality

package amadeus.personality
Provides user interface (UI) and interaction features for the Amadeus application.

This package includes the Speech class, which handles all user-facing interactions, such as displaying messages, commands, and task lists. It also includes features like typing effects, formatted text, and visual elements to enhance the user experience.

Key Class

  • Speech: Manages all UI interactions, including welcome messages, command lists, task displays, and notifications.

Usage Example

 // Display a welcome message
 Speech.sayWelcome();

 // Display the list of tasks
 Speech.sayList(taskList);

 // Display a farewell message
 Speech.sayGoodbye();
